name: CoinDuel-backend
author: Kooshul Jhaveri, Anish Chadalavada, Mitchell Revers, Rajiv Ramaiah, Henry Wilson, Josh Kerber

scripts.updateGame: while [ True ]; do curl -X POST https://coinduel-cs98.herokuapp.com/api/leaderboard/update; echo updated capcoin balances; sleep 60; done
scripts.endGame: curl -X POST https://coinduel-cs98.herokuapp.com/api/leaderboard/update -d '{ "endGame": true }' -H "Content-Type: application/json"; curl -X POST https://coinduel-cs98.herokuapp.com/api/game/end; curl -X POST https://coinduel-cs98.herokuapp.com/api/game/create
scripts.endGameDev: curl -X POST https://localhost:9000/api/leaderboard/update -d '{ "endGame": true }' -H "Content-Type: application/json"; curl -X POST https://localhost:9000/api/game/end; curl -X POST https://localhost:9000/api/game/create
